text: Kyrie Irving doesn't understand NY sports if he thinks the Nets are going to "take over" the city. He shouldn't say stuff like that if it's really his intention. More likely he'll be traded in 2 years to Chicago as a backup point guard. People will say, "Remember Kyrie Irving? He had such a promising carrer. What happened to him?" He should remember how NY chews up players who think they're bigger than the city. :boom:
